name: MME Real Estate
author: Multimedia Efectiva

sections.description:
MME Real Estate is a WordPress plugin developed by the Multimedia Efectiva team. MME Real Estate allows you to simply and efficiently manage a catalog of properties for rent or sale.

When programming this plugin we wanted to keep it simply, without complications, so you will not find excessive configurations or features that you will never use. Works on most popular WordPress themes.

Visit multimediaefectiva.com/mme-real-estate-plugin-bienes-raices/ for more information, in English and Spanish.

Do you have any suggestion? Would you like to incorporate a feature or adapt it to your operation? Do not hesitate to ask, we will be happy to assist you.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins â€º Add New.
  2. Search for MME Real Estate.
  3. Locate the plugin, download and activate it.
sections.changelog:

1.2

  • minor fixes.
  • NEW: Shortcodes to place properties an filter anywhere on the website.
  • NEW: Custom filter and breadcrumbs labels.

  • FIX: Language descriptions in readme.txt

1.1

  • FIX: Language folder issue
  • NEW: Added option to place currency symbol to the right or left of the property price.
  • NEW: Added the option in the dashboard to filter the properties by location.
  • minor fixes.

1.0

  • Initial release
